name: Corn Juice
description: Besides being rich in carbohydrates, corn also has many benefits such as increasing endurance to prevent heart disease and anemia. Therefore this menu is a recommendation to be given to toddlers.
directions: Boil sweet corn until cooked (set aside the boiled water and do not throw it away).
Sweet corn stew using a knife.
Blender sweet corn that has been smeared with sweet corn boiled water according to taste.
